definition: A systematic approach to treating and alleviating physical, mental, or emotional disorders, typically involving the guidance and support of a trained professional. It is commonly employed to address various health conditions and promote overall well-being.

examples.german: Die Therapie hat mir geholfen, meine Angst zu überwinden.
examples.english: The therapy helped me overcome my fear.

examples.german: Sie hat eine Therapie gegen ihre Rückenschmerzen begonnen.
examples.english: She started a therapy for her back pain.

examples.german: Die Therapie war sehr intensiv, aber es hat sich gelohnt.
examples.english: The therapy was very intense, but it was worth it.

examples.german: Die Therapie hat seine Lebensqualität verbessert.
examples.english: The therapy improved his quality of life.
